name: Afternoon Lunch
description:
You wake up feeling peckish, why don't you go make yourself some afternoon lunch?

NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST to nagivate.

LOOK, OPEN, CLOSE, TAKE, DROP, PET & MAKE - followed by a noun to interact. 

This is a short text-based game, it was made entirely with C++ in 12 hours, for a University project.

All code was written by me.
